post.body: We've got an official credo.. but my distillation is "to make the world a better place.. one relationship at a time."
What's up? Can we help?
What's up Brenda? Can we help?
Thanks 4 all the kind words for Frank! He's terrific. BTW.. I love your photography! You can tell that love goes into every shot.
are you in NM or AZ? If so, I'm your personal Comcaster. Have you been having Internet issues?
Can I help?
Consider @comcastcares, @comcastbill and me your personal Comcasters. Please direct your friends our way!
Happens all the time! We're glad to help.
can we help?
We do follow Twitter. How can I help?
Us ABQ guys can still take care of you.. shoot me an email to scott.westerman@comcast.net
Frank's been pretty transparent all along. We're all aok with you knowing who we are.
doing great. Lots of travel and budget review stuff is distracting me from my Twitter passion!
is it just the WX stuff or any page? PS way to go on the flying stuff, one pilot to another
tip = yup ;)
tip. Since October. I bet you will be ok.
absolutely. He represents the best we can be.
Thanks for all you've done to change perceptions, one relationship at a time. Its an honor to work with you.
have you alerted Joe?
glad to try to speed that up for you. Send your contact info and details to we_can_help@cable.comcast.com
it's on Wed, Dec 24 at 11:00pm EST on Comedy Central. Enjoy!
glad to check for you.
Hey Ryan.. Can I assist?
@UStream actually does a terrific job. Lots of good folks over there.
great news on your seating! Exit rows make all the difference for us tall guys, especially on the red eyes. Travel Safe!
Two useful books: Todd Cochrane's Podcasting Guide and Michael Geoghegan's Podcasting Solutions. Lots of tech tips there.
I use it for audio podcast intervies and it works great. If you're thinking video, checkout www.stickam.com.
I use it just for audio. The best video solution I've found is Stickam.com You can have multiple participants there.
I use one computer for skype and run the sound card output into a mixer which feeds the second computer which does the broadcasting
Glad to take a look at this for you. Send contact info and the details to we_can_help@cable.comcast.com
Nope. Their servers were experiencing some issues. Our end of the pipe should be working fine.
what are you experiencing? Don't think your connection should be slowing down.
Hey Shandy.. do you have a Comcast Issue I can assist with?
Frank is taking a well deserved vacation day. @comcastgeorge is on the case in his absence.
send your contact info to we_can_help@cable.comcast.com & we'll get the heavy hitters on the case.
Hey Michelle. What's up? Can I help with your Comcast issue?
Fancast totaly rocks. Watching Hawaii Five-0 over there right now on the laptop.
do a WoW search in the Comcast forums http://forums.comcast.net . I don't think the issue is on our side of the fence.
In upper Michigan in the AM, Houston now and Albuquerque later tonight. Looong day.
http://tinyurl.com/7bgry2 Who would you choose?
